title: TLS Server
extract: Secure server Server that protects host web pages using SSL or TLS. ... SSL Stands for secure sockets layer. Protocol for web browsers and servers that allows for the authentication, encryption and decryption of data sent over the Internet.
extract_html: Secure server Server that protects host web pages using SSL or TLS. ... SSL Stands for secure sockets layer. Protocol for web browsers and servers that allows for the authentication, encryption and decryption of data sent over the Internet.
